channel.title: Portfolios on Violeta Roizman
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Violeta Roizman

item.title: Shiny App #TidyTuesday
item.description: This is the first Shiny App I developed and also my first #TidyTuesday submission. I show the participation of twitter users to the hashtag #TidyTuesday with an interactive Github Heatmap I created with plotly. You can find the app here: https://violetr.shinyapps.io/tidytuesdaytweets/. You can find the code to generate it here: https://github.com/violetr/tidytuesday/tree/master/2019_01_01_shiny.
